content:
Is there anyone working on component model support for PHP?
If not, is there a list anywhere of languages that are actively working on supporting the component model?

The wasm team within VMWare made great progress on this last year. After the acquisition to broadcom, it's been a little quiet and I'm not sure of the status. Checkout https://github.com/webassemblylabs/webassembly-language-runtimes

GitHub - webassemblylabs/webassembly-language-runtimes: Wasm Language Runtimes provides popular language runtimes (Ruby, Python, …) precompiled to WebAssembly that are tested for compatibility and kept up to date when new versions of upstream languages are released
Wasm Language Runtimes provides popular language runtimes (Ruby, Python, …) precompiled to WebAssembly that are tested for compatibility and kept up to date when new versions of upstream languages ...
